text: The Raziano House, also known as Mahogany Manor, is a historic house located at 913 Minor Street in Kenner, Louisiana. Built in 1946 for Henry Raziano and his wife Amelia, the house is a two-story brick residence in the Colonial Revival style. with three photos and a map With . The house was listed on the National Register of Historic Places on August 14, 1998. ==See also== * National Register of Historic Places listings in Jefferson Parish, Louisiana ==References== Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in Louisiana Category:Neoclassical architecture in Louisiana Category:Houses completed in 1946 Category:Houses in Jefferson Parish, Louisiana
title: Raziano House
